info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 5:09PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN MONROE... SOUTHWESTERN BELMONT AND EASTERN NOBLE COUNTIES THROUGH 545 PM EDT... At 509 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Woodsfield, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jerusalem, Wilson, Somerton, and Miltonsburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
